name: Ethereal Blade
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

descriptions.name: Ether Blast
descriptions.description: Converts the target unit to ethereal form, rendering them immune to physical damage, but unable to attack and -40% more vulnerable to magic damage.  Lasts for 4.0 seconds on allies and 3.0 seconds on enemies.  Enemy targets are also slowed by -80%, and take 2.0x your primary attribute + 75 as magical damage.Range: 800
